definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: I particularly love their Rice Noodle Soup, and the Panang Curry chicken over rice.
sentences.chinese: 我特别喜欢他们的牛肉汤河粉和黄咖哩鸡烩饭。

sentences.english: Get the carrot, onion and garlic from the broth out and throw them out.
sentences.chinese: 把胡萝卜，葱和蒜从肉汤里取出来扔掉。

sentences.english: None of these effects occurred in mice that ate a broth with no added bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 在喂食不添加细菌的肉汤的老鼠中没有看到这些效果。

sentences.english: You can also use it in casseroles to great effect.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以选择用沙锅来制备这一种肉汤。

sentences.english: Italian Stir 3 Tbsp pesto and 1 c cooked pasta into the finished soup.
sentences.chinese: 用3大勺香蒜和意大利面条与一号肉汤熬成面汤。

sentences.english: Danshui fish balls are balls of fish paste stuffed with meat and garlic served in a light broth.
sentences.chinese: 淡水鱼丸是圆形的鱼酱酿肉和大蒜，加上清淡肉汤。

sentences.english: Leftover parsley can be added to chicken or beef broth that has been diluted and put in your ice cube tray.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的部分可以加入鸡肉或牛肉汤里制成小方冰块。

sentences.english: Dishes of bouillon were brought in hot and hot.
sentences.chinese: 一道道热气腾腾的肉汤被端上来了。

sentences.english: A pot of lip smacking clay pot beef soup is ready to be served.
sentences.chinese: 一锅热腾腾的砂煲牛肉汤终于可以端上了。

sentences.english: Then pour it with the broth and put in a fridge.
sentences.chinese: 然后倒上肉汤把它放进冰箱里保鲜。

sentences.english: Later I found a tuk-tuk, rush rush rushed, straight to the mutton shop.
sentences.chinese: 后来找了辆三蹦子，突突突，直奔羊肉汤店。
也许您想喝点牛肉汤吧。

sentences.english: And mutton soup is good to eat in winter.
sentences.chinese: 并且羊肉汤是好在冬天吃。

sentences.english: The potatoes are waiting for mutton soup.
sentences.chinese: 再往土豆上浇些羊肉汤就好了。

definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
